phrases: Cannot you see he is crying?
All men are not created equal.
This was the reality I learned about society at the young age of four.
It all began in China, in Qingqing City.
There was news that a baby that gave off light was born.
Ever since then, superpowers were discovered in various places...
Before we knew it, the supernatural became normal,
The world has become a superhuman society,
and about 80 of the world's population now has some kind of special trait.
In this world swirling with chaos...
He carries out justice through his great physical strength
The rescue specialist, Backdraft, is here, too!
But man, turning into a monster's an amazing Quirk.
He stole someone is bag and went out of control when he was cornered.
A Quirk like that, and he is a bag snatcher?
Yes, I do not know what time I will make it into work...
The young and talented rising star!
You were the one asking, but you gave a perfect commentary, kid.
You are a fanboy, are not you?
Illegal use of powers during rush hour and robbery resulting in bodily injury.
You are the incarnation of evil.
Here it is, here it is, here it is, here it is.
Today is the day of my debut!
A pleasure to make your ass-quaintance.
Here it is, here it is, here it is, here it is.
Along with the superpowers came an explosive increase in crime.
As the country was stuck in the slow progress of drastic law reforms,
courageous people started performing heroic acts from out of comic books.
Guarding against superpowers and defending against evil.
Heroes were soon accepted by the public,
and it was established as an official position.
Based on their performance, they are paid by the government...
She looks like she will be popular, and it is an amazing Quirk,
but thinking about the damage to the city that will go hand in hand with that,
No, but whether or not she can control the size...
Hey wait, you are taking notes?
You want to be a hero?
Since you are all third years, it is time for you to think seriously about your future.
I will pass out handouts for your future plans now, but...
Yes, yes, you all have wonderful Quirks!
But using your powers at school is against the rules!
Do not lump us all in the same group.
I am not going to be stuck at the bottom with the rest of these rejects!
You all should shut up like the extras you are!
Oh, if I remember correctly, you want to go to YOU.A.
It was in the top 0.2 this year, you know!
Their acceptance rate's always really low, too!
That is exactly why you guys are just extras!
I am the only one at this school who could possibly get into YOU.A.
I will definitely surpass All Might and become the top hero!
My name'll be inscribed on the list of top earners!
Oh yeah, Midoriya wanted to go to YOU.A., too, right?
You cannot get into the hero course just by studying!
Th-They got rid of that rule!
How can you even stand in the same ring as me?
It is not like I am trying to compete with you or anything!
It is just that it is been my goal ever since I was little.
Are you taking the test for fun?!
What the hell can you do?
Normally someone would come right away.
This guy's taking advantage of the chaos from this morning.
There are tons of people around who do not know what to do with their Quirks.
There is no end to them.
Hey, let us go to karaoke!
The incident this morning is all over the headlines!
I want to hurry up and go home so I can write it down in my notebook.
We are not done talking yet, Deku.
I-It is fine, is not it?
Most top first-string heroes have stories about them from their school days.
I want the shine of being able to be called the only student to make it into YOU.A.
from this mediocre city junior high school.
I mean, I am a perfectionist.
Come on, you could at least say something back.
If you want to be a hero that badly, there is a quick way to do it.
Believe that you will be born with a Quirk in your next life
and take a last chance dive off the roof!
If I really jumped, that would mean you instigated a suicide!
That is not fish food, stupid.
Jeez, you have probably added ten thousand views just by yourself, Izuku.
It is too scary for me.
A disaster that happened a long time ago.
The video of a hero that debuted right after that.
He is already saved a hundred people!
It has not even been ten minutes!
Once I get my Quirk, I want to be like him, too!
You should probably give it up.
Is something wrong with him after all?
Most of the other kindergarteners' Quirks have already manifested...
Excuse me, but you are fourth generation, right, madam?
May I ask about your Quirk?
I can pull small objects to me.
Normally, by age four, he would have manifested one of those Quirks,
or some combination of the two.
In the past, when the superpowers first started showing up, the results of an early research study were published.
It became common practice to see if the pinky toe was missing a joint or not.
When parts of the body are not used, they are deemed unnecessary.
People who did not have the joint were thought to be a newly evolved form.
You can see by looking at this x-ray
It is unusual to see that these days,
but that means he has no Quirk.
He is already saved a hundred people!
It has not even been ten minutes!
He saves everyone with a smile, no matter what trouble they are in...
He is such a cool hero...
Can I... be a hero, too?
What I wanted you to say back then was...
You decided back then, did not you?
Do not worry about what other people think!
Hold your head up high and plunge forward!
I am just going to take over your body.
It will only hurt for about 45 seconds.
I did not think that had come to this city.
It is all right now, young man.
I am glad you are okay!
Sorry'bout getting you caught up in my villain fighting.
I do not usually make mistakes like this,
but I was in high spirits on my day off in a new place.
But, you were a big help.
He looks completely different in person!
Well, I need take this guy to the police.
See you again on the other side of the screen!
Pros are constantly fighting enemies and time.
There are still... things I want to ask...
I am counting on your continued support!
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey!
I get it, so close your eyes and mouth!
If you talk to the people downstairs, I am sure they will let you down.
I seriously am outta time, so I really must go.
You should probably give it up.
What the hell can you do?
Even if I do not have a Quirk, can I become a hero?
Can even someone without a Quirk be like you?
At the time, I could not even imagine how much it would change my fate.
I am here for the next episode preview!
It took a boy hostage and is going wild around town?
But I cannot use my powers for much longer.
Next time, What It Takes to Be a Hero!
Pros are always risking their lives!
Next time: What It Takes to Be a Hero
